name: TheInspirationMachine
0:
”Alexa, give me a quote from The Inspiration Machine”
”Alexa, tell me a quote from The Inspiration Machine”
”Alexa, give me inspiration from The Inspiration Machine”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the inspiration machine
des: The Inspiration Machine provides a daily serving of inspiring quotations for life and business. Each interaction with The Inspiration Machine yields a randomly selected inspirational or motivational quote to reflect on.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
